data.title: Immediately made things right when room had a problem
data.text: The end of Oct we stayed here a family emergency trip so it was my son and I staying here. In the first room, we had gotten the tv (game playoffs) did not work , we were immediately moved to another room.  I sent an email in the early am asking about changing to another room with 2 beds instead of a sleeper sofa and a king bed if one was available,  I got an immediate response the next morning that they would upgrade us to a room with two beds at the same cost as the room we were in. Even though we decided to stay in the room with the sleeper sofa  and king bed, I was impressed by how fast my concerns were taken care of.    Friendly and easy to work with  This is my third time staying there and I would recommend this place to anyone traveling there. Nice assortment for Breakfast also.   Going back again in Jan.  Will book early this time.  Thank you and thumbs up on the service and friendly staff including the housekeepers.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you had a wonderful stay with us. Our staff here works hard everyday to ensure each guest has a wonderful stay. See you in January!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stay in Largo
data.text: The staff was very friendly and helpful, room was spacious, and the bed was super comfortable.  Breakfasts are served long enough to accommodate someone who sleeps in a bit late.  Really enjoyed the stay here.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you had a wonderful stay with us and we hope to have you back soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Stay
data.text: Here on business, hotel is close to shopping and on a main thoroughfare.  Rooms was clean and fresh.  I didnt give 5 stars because there is minimal outdoor seating....one bench in the front.  Thats it.  Was hoping in such a lovely climate some outdoor time could be enjoyed.  Not much amenity for that here.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you had a good stay with us while you were in town on business. We do have a pool area with more chairs for our guest's to relax. You will have to come back and enjoy that sometime soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Place for a work trip
data.text: This hotel is very clean and has a friendly staff. I've stayed here twice now and both times I didn't have any problems. The complimentary breakfast each morning suited my needs. If I go back to Largo I will most likely stay here.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you had another wonderful stay with us. See you next time you're in town.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pet friendly hotel with no designated pet area
data.text: We love to stay at the Holiday Inn Express because most of them are pet friendly. Most of them, thou, has designated pet area with poop bags and designated pet disposal container.  This hotel has a grassy area but nothing else.  We found a pile of dog poop bags by the side door because people can't find a trash can.  I did finally found one hiding in the bush by the side of the building. Other than that, typical Holiday Inn Express, good staff, decent breakfast, clean room.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Unfortunately we do not have a designated pet area, but we do have clean-up bags at the front desk. We hope to have you back the next time you're in the area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Liked it so much we booked for Thanksgiving
data.text: While visiting family we had stayed in another local hotel that we totally enjoyed. However, it was unavailable for our most recent visit.  So, we booked the Holiday Inn and were were so pleased we booked it again for November.  The rooms are comfortable and the staff are all very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was great with many choices.  The exercise room was terrific!

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you had such a wonderful stay with us. See you in November!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: To tired to drive
data.text: After a day out in the boat  driving all the way back to lakeland was not an option, so I crash at the holiday inn express at 210 seminole blvd, I really don't like hotels but this one was very nice, since I arrive  , the room was very nice and clean, I slept like a baby!!! Just to wake up to a nice breakfast.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you were able to get a great night's sleep and refuel with our wonderful breakfast in the morning. We hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: "Business Okay"
data.text: This hotel is a typical Holiday inn Express.  Breakfast is just ok.  Husband is a Spire Elite Member.  They upgraded us to a suite, larger room.  Nice bedding.  Nice TV.  Keurig Coffee Maker broke.  Lobby could use an update.  Older white haired man checked us in.  Very pleasant. We ate 15 min away at Guppys on The Beach.  #1 on Tripadvisor. Delicious.  Would probably stay here again.  This was a business trip.

owner_response.author: Christopher W, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your complimentary upgrade for you Spire Elite status. I am very sorry that the in-room Keurig was not working. We hope to have you back in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Brief weekend stay
data.text:
Pros
-This hotel is clean and neat . The rooms are a good size ( we stayed in a king bed ) clean and extremely comfortable. 
-Front staff extremely nice and very accommodating 
-The cleaning staff always visible which is a good sign to me .
-Large varieties of bread offered 

Cons
-The ac kept turning off and it got  really hot then kicked back on .
-The breakfast should improve in taste , quality,and selection . The hockey puck shaped eggs were ok . The meats offered were ok .

owner_response.author: Brittany G, Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your response!
I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed staying at the hotel.
As for the issues you mentioned, we are constantly working on improving our hotel and appreciate any input that is given.

Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business
data.text: This hotel is in a great location for shopping and dining. It is very close to beaches (just a few miles). The staff was very nice and helpful. I had to check out early and that wasn't a problem. The rooms have a microwave and mini fridge. The beds were comfortable. A little firm for me but still no problem sleeping. Air worked great. Breakfast was good. I would stay here again.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear TinaRed66,

Thank you for your kind words about your stay.  We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great price , great breakfast !!
data.text: The free breakfast had gravy ,and biscuits ! Yummy super fast check in at 3 pm rooms were clean one of my beds had something like a sauce smear at the side of the blanket near the floor not sure if the blanket had been washed lately ,but sheets looked clean ! Bathroom was clean !  Only flaws I saw was the bathroom wall in room 317 had some wallpaper coming off , and the dresser had some damage to the bottom missing a strip of wood with smear on the blanket ! I give it 4 ! Could use some minor fixes , but overall friendly staff ,safe , quiet !! Great price !

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your response to your recent stay with us.  I'm sorry you encountered those few issues but I appreciate you letting me know so we can correct that for future guests.  We hope you will allow us to serve you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Customer Service
data.text: I stayed at this hotel for business purposes.  The room was clean and well equipped with everything I needed for my stay.  The complimentary breakfast was a plus and offered enough choices that I did not eat the same thing everyday.  The thing that impressed me the most was the excellent customer service, starting with the front desk staff, the lady who prepares the breakfast, up to the housekeeping staff.  I will certainly stay at this location again when visiting this side of Florida.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear emsgal4401,

Thank you for your kind words regarding your stay with us.  We appreciate your business and we hope to serve you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average stay at largo
data.text: Nothing outstanding. pool only open until 9 pm. Bath Towels were rationed and needed to be obtained at front desk if needing more than two.  Breakfast was surprisingly crowded and pancake machine was malfunctioning during the busy holiday weekend. average....stay. There are better and worse.....A park was next door but not something to enjoy after dark when the pool closes as  the automatic sprinklers come on,  Same for athletic park after dark across the street not lit for night. Seems to be a location while on your vacation as a stop to going somewhere else such as nearby bell aire beach but not as a destination in and of itself but stop over for restful,sleep but ask to be away from noisy elevators we learned.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Travelover328,

Thank you for taking your time to comment on your recent stay with us.  I apologize that your stay was not a 5 star experience and that you were not 100% satisfied.  We strive to make our guests feel at home away from home and I'm sorry that wasn't the case here over the holiday weekend.  I hope you will give us another chance in the future to serve you and show you how amazing our hotel really is.  Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hospitality Conf Stay
data.text: Stayed 5 days for a Hospitality Conf, The front desk help was very nice, The cleaning Ladies were outstanding, It was an ok stay, clean room good beds. nice cold air. Morning food was ok. Carpets are dirty in hallways, & worn in other places, But that is about all I can say about that.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Darrell Y,

Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I apologize that your stay was not a 5 star experience and up to your standards.  We will be going through a renovation within the 2 next quarters to include new hallway carpeting.  I hope you will give us another chance to serve you in the future and show you how beautiful our hotel really is.

Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Don't expect a lot
data.text: Hotel staff is helpful and friendly however the hotel itself is lacking.  The elevator moves like it is being operated by a monkey with a chain and pulley, very slow.  Hallways are hot and the air conditioner in the rooms lock at 68 degrees.  Housekeeping is very lacking, upon arriving to my room in noticed the bathroom was barely cleaned, I found hair on the shower floor, I also found the hair you never want to find on the toilet seat. Even after housekeeping vacuumed the room I found lint on the carpet.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear 442babe,

Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us your feedback. I am pleased to know that you found our hotel staff is helpful and friendly and I apologize if our housekeeping service fell below your expectations. Your review is vital for improving the service and quality we offer to our valued guest. It is always hugely motivating when one takes the time and trouble to acknowledge or give points for improvement. We hope to get the opportunity of welcoming you back in the future. Thank you once again for your valuable comment, and if you might have any suggestions that will contribute to enhancing your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sincerely,

Krysllin G.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Really nice Holiday Inn
data.text: Stayed here last year for a few days.  Came back this year.  Not far from the beach.  Quite and close to shopping.  Hotel is clean and comfortable.  Staff is friendly and breakfast is ok. Washer and dryer on 5th floor.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear snuffdawg01,

Thank you for your kind comments regarding our property and location.  We hope to serve you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good hotel.   Great breakfast.
data.text: We stayed here almost a week.   The staff are great and very helpful.   Our teens enjoyed the breakfast with pancakes,  fruit,  omlets, sausage and more.   Only complaints are the low shower water pressure and the small pool.  Otherwise,  it's a great value!

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words regarding our staff and breakfast.  I apologize about the water pressure.  I have notified maintenance regarding this issue so this doesnt affect any future guests.  Thank yuo for bringing this to our attention.  We hope to serve you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel
data.text: Very impressed with the hotel and staff at this hotel.  The hotel looked relatively new to me and I was told they were going to be remodeling soon which surprised us.  The cleaning ladies were awesome!  Very friendly!!  The breakfast was better then what we have seen at other hotels.  Nice hotel!

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Lisa J,

Thank you for commenting on your recent stay with us.  We are so pleased you found our property up to your standards.  We hope to serve you again next time you are in the Largo/Clearwater area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great place to stay
data.text: this hotel is very nice to stay in,  friendly staff and very nice and clean rooms   it is very close to largo central park which is nice.  plenty of parking.  the free breakfast was very good and enjoy it.  u get full from it.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear coolracer31,

Thank you for your recent review regarding your stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express and Suites Largo Central Park and thank you for your kind words about our staff and cleanliness.  We strive to make every guests experience a memorable one and I am glad we were able to do that for you.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Rooms Great, Halls Disgusting
data.text:
Staying two nights until beachfront condo rental begins. Easy access, easy to find. Neighborhood is a little sketchy but nothing serious. About 10 min from Clearwater Beach/Bellaire Beach. 

Rooms are very clean, modern, and A/C is Cool (thermostats only allow for a minimum of 68). Works best if you leave bathroom fan on and door slightly ajar as the fan pulls some of the warmer air out. 

Front desk was polite and professional as was breakfast staff. Housekeeping left friendly note for the family. 

Pool area is amazing but be aware that the pool area is shaded most of the day (which is awesome if you ask me-my wife disagrees)

What is so unacceptable as a IHG Gold is the condition of the halls and elevator. Elevator needs a good scrubbing as do the hall carpets. Room on fifth floor and I can honestly say that it has the grossest carpet I have ever seen. What's strange is carpet is modern style but I would bet the bank it has NEVER seen a steam cleaner.

Considering the great condition of everything else it's just strange.

owner_response.author: Tavara S, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Largo-Clearwater, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear bucckeyefan38,

Thank you for taking the time to comment on our reccent stay with us.  We are glad you found our staff and services up to your standards.  We will be going through a renovation at the end of this year to include new hallway carpets.  I do hope that you will give us the opportunity to show you just how great our hotel is.  Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
